meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elizabeth Pfeifer John Mahone Keith Whitener Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6469.

td.p: Elizabeth Pfeifer, an executive assistant from Oakton, Virginia
John Mahone, an SAT teacher from Brooklyn, New York
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina (whose 6-day cash winnings total $118,398)

tr.td: THE THREE Rs
(Alex: There will be three "R"s in each correct response.)
POLYNESIA
I WORKED FOR ROGER CORMAN
CONTESTS
THE OLD GRAY MAYOR
THE CIA

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
